"PIXI.AbstractFilter"

Constructor

new(fragmentSrc : Array<String>, uniforms : Dynamic)
parameters
fragmentSrc
uniforms
This is the base class for creating a pixi.js filter. Currently only webGL supports filters. If you want to make a custom filter this should be your base class.

Instance Variables

dirty : Bool

padding : Float

Instance Methods

syncUniforms() : Void

Syncs the uniforms between the class object and the shaders.
